timeline.bodyText: Unless this was tried already, and rejected for some reason, I would recommend to add Tree.Kind.RECORD into TreeUtilities.CLASS_TREE_KINDS. The purpose of that constant is to keep all kinds that map to ClassTree.
timeline.author: lahodaj

replies.bodyText: Tree.Kind.RECORD is a final Enumset, So adding RECORD here as a preview feature would result a compilation failure for the versions below 14.
replies.author: singh-akhilesh

timeline.bodyText: There should be a SourceVersion check, or something along those lines, and the test case should be skipped if the current javac does not support records. Otherwise, the test will fail when running e.g. with nb-javac without records. (Dtto the other occurrence below.)
timeline.author: lahodaj

timeline.bodyText: Ideally, unnecessary changes should be undone.
timeline.author: lahodaj

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if the reflection should be separated into TreeShims. But this can wait.
timeline.author: lahodaj

replies.bodyText: It would be good if we wait and fix this at later stage.
replies.author: singh-akhilesh

timeline.bodyText: Ideally comments like "//To change..." should be deleted.
timeline.author: lahodaj

timeline.bodyText: This should be (presumably?) uncomentted. (Dtto the other occurrences below.)
timeline.author: lahodaj
lahodaj
